pr_title: feat(ProjectUI): Custom Field for Additional data in Proejct

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we can make this method and setCustomFieldsEdit() Generic for Project, Component, Release
timeline.author: JaideepPalit

replies.bodyText: I don't see any significance of using Generic method, as it requires additional effort of identifying the object type and typecasting the object to respective class (Project, Component or Release) in order to get the additionalData field. Kindly suggest if there is a way to achieve it using generic method but without typecasting.
replies.author: akapti

timeline.message:
